title: Double Toggle Light Switch,15 Amp AC120 Volt,Residential Grade Electrical Wall Switch,Great for Home, Office & Kitchen, White,ETL Listed

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #20,900 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #75 in Electrical Light Switches       #75 in Electrical Light Switches

description: Wengart Toggle Light Switch is perfect for any area of the home. Its simple and practical design will help you save space in any area of your home. This switch is sleek and its impact-resistant exterior ensures a long life. This combination decorative switch has a light-colored body that fits into a standard junction box, and it's made of polycarbonate thermoplastic (PCT) material for durability. PCT makes this wall plate resistant up to 140 degrees, so there's no need to worry about the material melting or fading. This dual switch is easy to install and can replace a regular decorative switch for more control over more appliances. Control lights and fans from the same location. These switches are perfect for turning on ventilation fans and lights separately in the bathroom, or switching cabinet lights and overhead lights separately in the kitchen. Specification: Voltage：AC120VCurrent：15AmpGrounding: Self-Grounding with auto Ground ClipFlammability: UL94 V2Grade: Residential & Commercial GradeAccepts #12 and #14 AWG(Push-In wire #14 AWG only)
shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Our light switches are suitable for residential use and most commercial areas that require 15A, 120V (AC), 3-way or single pole. They are UL listed for your peace of mind.

Our light switches offer quick push-in wiring and side wiring. Quick-wire push-in terminals easily connect to #14AWG solid copper wire only. Side terminal screws accept copper or copper-clad wire up to #12AWG.
The toggle light switch is constructed of high-quality materials, including impact-resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel, for long life and smooth, quiet switching action.
Our light switches are designed with a self-grounding clip that automatically connects in a properly grounded metal wall box.

Our light switches feature snap-off plaster ears for optimal flush alignment, and the shallow body design leaves more room for wires in standard junction boxes, adding a touch of elegance to your home

customers_say: Customers find the light switch to be of good quality and easy to install. They appreciate its functionality and consider it a great value for money.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Did the trick.  Served a niche function effectively, on a budget.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I bought 1 and the switching function was rough, so I opened it up to try and see why. Let's say I had a really hard time putting it back together (it has a lot of pieces inside). After getting it together the front case wouldn't close unless held together. I got it hooked up and 1 switch controlled all 4 lights. So I tossed it.I bought another one and after googling I Come to realize it was obviously my fault, I was supposed to snip the side pieces to separate the 2 switches. Hooked it up and it worked. The rough switching was the same on the 2nd one too. Must be a design flaw

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Difficult to put on wires. When finally put wires on, poles worked opposite; when both on let, one is on and the other is off! I ended up removing it

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSaves a lot of money if you can fix it.
